bibl.title: An Historical Commentary on the "Hellenica Oxrhynchia". (Cambridge Classical Studies.)
bibl.seg: Bruce I.A.F., An Historical Commentary on the "Hellenica Oxrhynchia". (Cambridge Classical Studies.)
Cambridge, University Press, 1967, 8°, xi-177 pp., 3 figg.

C.R. par Marcel Delaunois, EtCl 36 (1968) pp. 69-70. - Ettore Sabbadini, RSC 15 (1967) pp. 383-384. - Jacques Schwartz, AntCl 36 (1967) p. 643. - Ch.D. Hamilton, CP 64 (1969) pp. 203-204. - D. Lotze, JHS 88 (1968) pp. 161-162. - Albert Tomsin, RBPhil 46 (1968) pp. 1432-1433. - Édouard Will, RPhil 3e s., 42 (1968) pp. 336-337. - Franz Hampl, AnzAW 21 (1968) col. 173. - Paul Pédech, REG 81 (1968) pp. 616-617. - Roger de Laix, CJ 65 (1969) p. 37. - H.W. Parke, Hermathena No. 109 (1969) p. 67. - G.L. Cawkwell, CR N.S., 18 (1968) pp. 288-290. - Marta Sordi, RivFil 3a s., 96 (1968) pp. 336-339. - A.B. Breebaart, Mnemosyne 4e s., 24 (1971) pp. 309-311. - Elizabeth Visser, BibO 28 (1971) pp. 338-339. - J. Pegueroles, StPap 8 (1969) pp. 135-136.
